sentences.sContent: This has been cited as the reason she was not included with the others: The Nobel Prize is not awarded posthumously.
sentences.sContent_eng: This has been cited as the reason she was not included with the others: The Nobel Prize is not awarded posthumously.
sentences.sCn: 她的死已被引证为她没有和其他三位一起包括在内的原因：人死之后不授予诺贝尔奖。

sentences.sContent: Myth: The prize can be awarded posthumously.
sentences.sContent_eng: Myth: The prize can be awarded posthumously.
sentences.sCn: 误解：奖项可以在死后追授。

words.tran: 死后的；遗腹的；作者死后出版的
